title: The Fiend
content: e Conjure beam(s) of crackling energy.The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level and three beams at 11th level. Each beam is rolled separately. 18m Friends Cantrip Enchantment Action Inflicts Friends (10) Gain Advantage on Charisma Checks against a non-hostile creature. 9m Concentration Mage Hand Cantrip Conjuration Action Create a spectral hand that can manipulate and interact with objects. 18m Minor Illusion Cantrip Illusion Action Create an illus
